io.github.bananapuncher714.crafters.implementation.API

Interface CraftInventoryManager


  • public interface CraftInventoryManager
    The PublicCraftingInventory manager; Organizes, loads, and saves all the inventories; Created on 2017-12-07
    Author:
    BananaPuncher714

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void animate(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Plays an arm swing animation for all other nearby players, randomly chooses left or right arm.
      PublicCraftingInventory get(org.bukkit.Location location)
      Get the PublicCraftingInventory at the specified location.
      org.bukkit.Location getLocation(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory)
      Get the location of an PublicCraftingInventory from a crafting inventory
      void load(org.bukkit.Location location, java.util.List<org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack> items)
      Load a PublicCraftingInventory with the given items
      void openWorkbench(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, org.bukkit.Location location)
      Open a public workbench for the specified player at the location provided
      void remove(org.bukkit.Location location)
      Delete the PublicCraftingInventory at the specified location, if one exists.
      void stopAll()
      Stop and save all the loaded PublicCraftingInventory
      boolean unload(org.bukkit.Chunk chunk)
      Save all the tables inside the specified chunk; this will delete the tables in that chunk until they're loaded back in.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        PublicCraftingInventory get(org.bukkit.Location location)
        Get the PublicCraftingInventory at the specified location.
        Parameters:
        location - Any location, does not need to be a crafting table.
        Returns:
        null if no inventory has been created.

      • getLocation

        org.bukkit.Location getLocation(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory)
        Get the location of an PublicCraftingInventory from a crafting inventory
        Parameters:
        inventory - A public crafting table inventory
        Returns:
        null if the inventory isn't a public crafting inventory

      • remove

        void remove(org.bukkit.Location location)
        Delete the PublicCraftingInventory at the specified location, if one exists.
        Parameters:
        location - The location of a possible inventory.

      • openWorkbench

        void openWorkbench(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                   org.bukkit.Location location)
        Open a public workbench for the specified player at the location provided
        Parameters:
        player - The player to open for
        location - The location; will create a new PublicCraftingInventory if none exists

      • stopAll

        void stopAll()
        Stop and save all the loaded PublicCraftingInventory

      • load

        void load(org.bukkit.Location location,
          java.util.List<org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack> items)
        Load a PublicCraftingInventory with the given items
        Parameters:
        location - Any location without an inventory already
        items - Must be a list of 9 items

      • unload

        boolean unload(org.bukkit.Chunk chunk)
        Save all the tables inside the specified chunk; this will delete the tables in that chunk until they're loaded back in.
        Parameters:
        chunk - The chunk to save them in;
        Returns:
        Whether or not any tables were found and saved.

      • animate

        void animate(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Plays an arm swing animation for all other nearby players, randomly chooses left or right arm.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who is supposed to swing their arm.
